body_html:
@coolchicha any progress on this? I'm having a similar problem trying to compile a graph using tfcompile.
GDB traceback is

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
#1  0x0000000000431465 in void tensorflow::xla::EigenConvF32Impl<Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>(Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice const&, float*, float*, float*, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long) ()
#2  0x0000000000403972 in __tensorflow_compiler_aot_tests_mnist_x86__convolutional_mnist ()
#3  0x000000000000001c in ?? ()
#4  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#5  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#6  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#7  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#8  0x0000000000000020 in ?? ()
#9  0x000000000000001a in ?? ()
#10 0x000000000000001a in ?? ()
#11 0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#12 0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#13 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) quit

EDIT: I already tried to disable optmization flags like those appointed by #9638, still having the issue.
body_text:
@coolchicha any progress on this? I'm having a similar problem trying to compile a graph using tfcompile.
GDB traceback is
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
#1  0x0000000000431465 in void tensorflow::xla::EigenConvF32Impl<Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>(Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice const&, float*, float*, float*, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long) ()
#2  0x0000000000403972 in __tensorflow_compiler_aot_tests_mnist_x86__convolutional_mnist ()
#3  0x000000000000001c in ?? ()
#4  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#5  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#6  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#7  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()

#13 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) quit


EDIT: I already tried to disable optmization flags like those appointed by #9638, still having the issue.
body:
@coolchicha any progress on this? I'm having a similar problem trying to compile a graph using tfcompile. 
GDB traceback is 

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0000000000425bed in void Eigen::TensorEvaluator<Eigen::TensorContractionOp<Eigen::array<Eigen::IndexPair<long long>, 1ul> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorImagePatchOp<-1l, -1l, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::TensorReshapingOp<Eigen::DSizes<long long, 2> const, Eigen::TensorMap<Eigen::Tensor<float const, 4, 1, long>, 16, Eigen::MakePointer> const> const> const, Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>::evalProduct<true, true, false, 0>(float*) const ()
#1  0x0000000000431465 in void tensorflow::xla::EigenConvF32Impl<Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice>(Eigen::ThreadPoolDevice const&, float*, float*, float*, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long, long long) ()
#2  0x0000000000403972 in __tensorflow_compiler_aot_tests_mnist_x86__convolutional_mnist ()
#3  0x000000000000001c in ?? ()
#4  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#5  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#6  0x0000000000000003 in ?? ()
#7  0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#8  0x0000000000000020 in ?? ()
#9  0x000000000000001a in ?? ()
#10 0x000000000000001a in ?? ()
#11 0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#12 0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#13 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) quit

```

EDIT: I already tried to disable optmization flags like those appointed by #9638, still having the issue.
